en.name: Obsidian Codex
en.2p: While the equipping character is in Nightsoul’s Blessing and is on the field, their DMG dealt is increased by 15%.
en.4p: After the equipping character consumes 1 Nightsoul point while on the field, CRIT Rate increases by 40% for 6s. This effect can trigger once every second.

zh.name: 黑曜秘典
zh.2p: 装备者处于夜魂加持状态，并且在场上时，造成的伤害提高15%。
zh.4p: 装备者在场上消耗1点夜魂值后，暴击率提高40%，持续6秒。该效果每1秒至多触发一次。
